name: Speed! (JimSan Black Hole)
description:
You may know the card game "Speed!". But if you don't, then let me introduce it to you. In this game, you will try to be faster and wiser. This game has a tutorial if you want to learn how to play it, and thanks to its three difficulty modes, you will have the chance to learn and perfect your skills.

Now go, and let the game begin!
